name: Pixel Point Technology
description:
Pixel Point Technology  Leading Mobile App development & Web App development firm in India & UAE. We have strong experience of result oriented mobile app development using the latest technology.
When we talk about the working pattern then first comes analysis. Analysis of a project is a major part of the work because if you don’t analyze the project requirements then you will ruin the entire project so Analysis is the first task of a project. In the analysis, an analyst gathers the requirements and arranges it to the sequence wise according to the requirement and creates a documentation of the requirements in easy words so that Developers can understand the requirements.
Mostly we use the agile method of working first we have to understand that what is an agile method of working? In the agile method, we use to send daily or weekly or Monthly work updates so that Clients can track the work progress but same time there is a benefit of this method, working in agile method helps us to maintain a record of works which we have done present time 
 
Our Key services:
iPhone Mobile  App development
Android Mobile App development
Hybrid Application development
Open source development
Custom App development
